go-asyncapi.name: go-asyncapi
go-asyncapi.description: This library helps to create AsyncAPI spec from your Go message structures. It uses reflection to translate Go structures in JSON Schema definitions and arrange them in AsyncAPI schema.

faststream.name: faststream
faststream.description: A powerful and easy-to-use Python framework for building asynchronous services interacting with event streams such as Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ and NATS.

modelina.name: modelina
modelina.description: Generate payload models into Java, TypeScript, Go, etc, you name it, from AsyncAPI documents. This tool gives you full control over the models through high customization.

converter.name: converter
converter.description: Converts old versions of AsyncAPI files into the latest version.

java-asyncapi.name: java-asyncapi
java-asyncapi.description: This tool stores modules, which simplifies interacting with AsyncAPI in jvm ecosystem.

kotlin-asyncapi.name: kotlin-asyncapi
kotlin-asyncapi.description: The Kotlin AsyncAPI project aims to provide convenience tools for generating and serving AsyncAPI documentation. The core of this project is a Kotlin DSL for building the specification in a typesafe way.

saunter.name: saunter
saunter.description: Saunter is an AsyncAPI documentation generator for dotnet. Generates (and hosts) an AsyncAPI schema document from your code.
